      • askConfirmationForOpeningProject

        public int askConfirmationForOpeningProject(VirtualFile file,
                                            Project project)
        If known that a user tries to open some project, ask if the user wants to open it as a plain file or as a project.
        Returns:
        Messages.YES -> Open as a project, Messages.NO -> Open as a plain file, Messages.CANCEL -> Don't open.

      • doOpenProject

        public abstract Project doOpenProject(VirtualFile virtualFile,
                                      Project projectToClose,
                                      boolean forceOpenInNewFrame)

      • lookForProjectsInDirectory

        public boolean lookForProjectsInDirectory()
        Allow opening a directory directly if the project files are located in that directory.
        Returns:
        true if project files are searched inside the selected directory, false if the project files must be selected directly.

      • canImportProjectAfterwards

        public boolean canImportProjectAfterwards()
        Returns true if this processor is able to import the project after it has been opened in IDEA.
        See Also:
        importProjectAfterwards(Project, VirtualFile)

      • importProjectAfterwards

        public void importProjectAfterwards(Project project,
                                    VirtualFile file)
        Import the project after it has already been opened in IDEA.
        See Also:
        canImportProjectAfterwards()

      • getImportProvider

        public static ProjectOpenProcessor getImportProvider(VirtualFile file)

      • getImportProvider

        public static ProjectOpenProcessor getImportProvider(VirtualFile file,
                                                     boolean onlyIfExistingProjectFile)
        Parameters:
        onlyIfExistingProjectFile - when true, doesn't return 'generic' providers that can open any non-project directory/text file (e.g. PlatformProjectOpenProcessor)

      • isStrongProjectInfoHolder

        public boolean isStrongProjectInfoHolder()
        Returns:
        true if this open processor should be ranked over general .idea and .ipr files even if those exist.
